message.content:
1. The study involved patients with inoperable or persistent/recurrent CTEPH.
2. The number of patients in the study was 261.
3. The mean age of the patients was 59 years.
4. The standard deviation of the patients' ages was 14 years.
5. 66% of the patients were women.
6. The patients were randomised to receive either riociguat or a placebo.
7. The dosage of riociguat given was up to 2.5 mg.
8. Riociguat was administered three times daily.

messages.content:
Statement: Patients with inoperable or persistent/recurrent CTEPH (n=261; mean± SD age 59±14 years; 66% women) were randomised to riociguat (up to 2.5 mg three times daily) or placebo.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
